member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.AddCreateFlags
member.summary: Set additional flags that will be included in the call to .
member.param: The flags that will be included in the dwCreationFlags parameter passed to .
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.AddStartupFlags
member.summary: Additional flags that will be included in the structure passed to .
member.param: The flags that will be included in the dwFlags member of the structure passed to .
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.GetCreateFlags
member.summary: Gets the additional flags that will be passed to .
member.param: A pointer to a DWORD which receives the flags that will be passed as the dwCreationFlags parameter to .
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.SetCreateFlags
member.summary: Set the flags that will be included in the call to .
member.param: The flags that will be passed to the dwCreationFlags parameter to .
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.SetEnvironmentVariable
member.summary: Sets a variable in the environment of the created process.
member.param: A null-terminated string specifying the name of a variable to be set in the environment of the process to be created. This parameter may not be NULL.
A null-terminated string specifying the value of the variable to be set in the environment of the process to be created. his parameter may not be NULL.
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.SetHotKey
member.summary: Sets the hot key for the application.
member.param: The hotkey to assign to the application. See the documentation of the hStdIn member of the structure for more information.
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs.SetTitle
member.summary: Sets the title that will be passed .
member.param: A null-terminated string specifying the title that will be passed in the lpTitle member of the structure passed to . This parameter may not be NULL.
member.returns: S_OK if the method succeeds. Otherwise, an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICreateProcessInputs
member.summary: Used by the interface to alter some parameters of the process that is being created.
